Class IO_WordsAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<IO_WordsAdapter.WordViewHolder>
algonquin.cst2335.androidfinalproject.IO_dictionary.ui.adapters.IO_WordsAdapter
public class IO_WordsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<IO_WordsAdapter.WordViewHolder>
Adapter class for displaying a list of words in a RecyclerView.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Iuliia Obukhova
